events.message: I ordered a jacket last week, but I want to return it because it doesn't fit properly and I would like a full refund.
The request was categorized under Refund based on the customer's mention of return and refund.
Support agent Sarah Lee has been assigned to handle the refund request for the jacket return.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm here to assist you with your return and refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm that the jacket is unused and in its original packaging?
Sure, my order number is #9823745. The jacket has never been worn and is still in the sealed bag it came in.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated your refund request. Please use the prepaid return label we have emailed to send back the jacket.
Great, thanks for making this process easy. I will print the label and send the jacket back today.
We received the returned jacket and have processed your full refund. Please allow 3-5 business days for the amount to reflect in your account.
Just following up to confirm you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
As you have confirmed receipt of the refund, we are closing this case. Thank you for shopping with us and we hope to serve you again.
